# Movila

Movila generates beautiful mini-films from your life memories. Using AI, we transform family photos into cinematic heritage films that capture the journey, emotions, and memories of your loved ones.

---

## Overview

Upload your favorite family photos — from vintage prints to recent snapshots — and Movila creates a professionally crafted mini-film that honors the people you love. Within an hour, receive a moving cinematic tribute ready to share, download, or gift.

---

## Product & Features

- **Photo to Film**: Transform scattered family photos into cohesive, cinematic mini-films.
- **AI-Powered**: Our AI handles transitions, color grading, pacing, and emotional arc.
- **All Formats Welcome**: Old black-and-white prints, polaroids, digital photos — we handle them all.
- **Customizable**: Choose from film styles, select music, add captions and custom title cards.
- **Fast Delivery**: Most mini-films are ready within an hour.
- **Privacy First**: Photos encrypted during upload, deleted within 30 days of delivery.

---

## How it works

1. **Upload Photos**: Gather 15-50 family photos spanning any era.
2. **Choose Style**: Select a film style and music that matches your family's story.
3. **Receive Film**: Within an hour, receive your HD mini-film via email.

---

## Learn more

- Website: https://movila.io
